name: Nature Is Healing
description:
The year is 2075. An experiment gone wrong has created THE MOLD, and most of humanity has been wiped from the earth. You are one of the few survivors, trapped in an underground bunker with only a flamethrower. You must try to keep back THE MOLD. But eventually, it will kill you too.

This game was created in 72 hours as part of Ludum Dare 50. It is a top-down shooter where the only enemy is an ever growing mold. Fight to survive as long as you can in randomized levels.

Credits / Attributions:

Art, Programming, Design: KingOfSpill
